engforge.dataframeÔÉÅ

Dataframe Module:

Store data in dataframes and provide a simple interface to manipulate it.

Functions

determine_split

is_uniform

key_func

split_dataframe

split dataframe into a dictionary of invariants and a dataframe of variable values
